amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the funding for Research, Development, Test and Evaluation for the Air Force by $297,023,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to transfer $297,023,000 from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 98 - 322 (Roll no. 499).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 98 - 322 (Roll no. 499).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Welch.
